```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
install.packages("devtools")
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```
> Word count: 'r wordcountaddin::word_count()'

###Committee Party Affiliation 

```{r, message=FALSE}
party_cmte <- committees %>%
  filter(cmte_state == "AZ") %>%
  filter(cmte_party_affiliation %in% c("DEM", "REP")) %>%
  group_by(cmte_party_affiliation) %>%
  select(cmte_id) 
party_cmte
```

###Committee Contribution  

```{r, message=FALSE}
trans_amt <- contributions %>%
  select(cmte_id, transaction_amt)
trans_amt
```

###Committe Expenditure

```{r, message=FALSE}
cmte_expenditure <-inner_join(party_cmte, trans_amt)
cmte_expenditure
```
